name: 1.Project Overview
content:
AP & AR Cashflow Forecasting

Project overview:

Cashflow forecasting is critical for businesses to ensure liquidity, stability, and growth planning. This project focuses on predicting future inflows (Accounts Receivable) and outflows (Accounts Payable, Payrolls, and other expenses) to help businesses proactively manage their working capital.


Approach

Data Collection:

  • Gather raw data from AP, AR, Payrolls, Orders, Inflows, Outflows.

Data Preparation:

  • Clean and transform datasets (AP & AR invoices, payments, PO/SO orders).
  • Generate structured time-series datasets for forecasting.

Prediction & Integration:

  • Generate future forecasts for AP, AR, Payrolls.
  • Combine them into a Final Forecast dataset.

Trend & Seasonality Analysis:

  • Extract seasonal payment cycles and customer/vendor behavior.
  • Highlight peak inflow and outflow periods.

Significance

  • Liquidity Management: Ensures businesses can cover short-term obligations.
  • Strategic Planning: Aligns investment and expansion plans with cash availability.
  • Risk Mitigation: Anticipates cash shortages and surpluses in advance.
  • Operational Efficiency: Optimizes payment timing and collection strategies.

Expected Outcomes

  • Accurate Forecasts of AP, AR, Payrolls, and overall cashflows.
  • Visibility on Seasonality for better planning of inflows/outflows.
  • Final Forecast Dashboard integrating all predictions into a single view.
  • Actionable Insights for treasury, finance, and operations teams.
